name: The Night Watch: Ranger Survival
description:
The Night Watch : Ranger Survival is now available!

Objectives

: As a ranger on a watch, you must survive through the darkest part of night (10 minutes).

: You can shoot fast, shoot wide, and perform upgraded skills learned while you take down waves of enemies.
: You must not only save yourself, but also keep the bonfire burning, your only source of light/vision.

Features

: 3 Stages With Distinctive Features.

: 9 monsters + 4 boss monsters with different attribute & skills
: 15 upgrades to boost your power and possibility of survival

Future Plans

: More COOL RANGER SKILLS

: More PLAYABLE RANGERS
: More upgrades & monsters & stages
: ... many other wild stuffs, I hope. :)
